typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceproducts
sourceproducts derive(DDV_Product = substring({DDV Produit},4,4)) ~> DerivedColumnTypeConvertions
